Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) package spaghetti, broken in half

Ingredients.7: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, whisk mayonnaise, chili sauce, lime juice, and Sriracha together in a bowl.

Directions.3: Melt butter in a large soup pot over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and cook for 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, 1 more minute. Add cooked spaghetti and mayonnaise-chili sauce; toss to combine. Cook until sauce is hot, about 2 minutes. Turn heat off and let sit for 5 minutes to thicken.

Directions.4: Divide among serving plates and garnish with chopped scallion.
